text: War Along the Mohawk is a 1998 strategy video game developed by Edward Grabowski Communications and published by Empire Interactive Entertainment. == Plot and gameplay == The game takes place in 1757 when France and England are fighting in the American Northeast. The player chooses a character at the start of the game and when that character dies the game is over. The player completes various missions and in between they spend their time at their fort fending off Native Americans or wild animals. == Critical reception == PC Gamer thought the game has a clunky interface. Computer Gaming World did not like the linear gameplay.
